mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_RECIPE A JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO JOIN T_CODE C ON C.CODE_GROUP = 'CATEGORY' AND C.CODE_CD = A.CATEGORY_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.VIEWS_CNT DESC

SELECT B.USER_IMAGE, B.USER_NAME, B.USER_NO, A.RECIPE_NO, A.SELL_CNT, A.SELL_PAY, A.THUMBNAIL, A.TITLE, A.TAG, C.CODE_NM AS CATEGORY, A.TIP, A.INFO, A.CREATE_DATETIME FROM T_RECIPE A JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO JOIN T_CODE C ON C.CODE_GROUP = 'CATEGORY' AND C.CODE_CD = A.CATEGORY_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.VIEWS_CNT DESC

SELECT B.USER_IMAGE, B.USER_NAME, B.USER_NO, A.RECIPE_NO, A.SELL_CNT, A.SELL_PAY, A.THUMBNAIL, A.TITLE, A.TAG, C.CODE_NM AS CATEGORY, A.TIP, A.INFO, A.CREATE_DATETIME FROM T_RECIPE A JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO JOIN T_CODE C ON C.CODE_GROUP = 'CATEGORY' AND C.CODE_CD = A.CATEGORY_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND A.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo} ORDER BY A.VIEWS_CNT DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT B.USER_IMAGE, B.USER_NAME, B.USER_NO, A.RECIPE_NO, A.SELL_CNT, A.SELL_PAY, A.THUMBNAIL, A.TITLE, A.TAG, C.CODE_NM AS CATEGORY, A.TIP, A.INFO, A.CREATE_DATETIME, A.VIEWS_CNT FROM T_RECIPE A JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO JOIN T_CODE C ON C.CODE_GROUP = 'CATEGORY' AND C.CODE_CD = A.CATEGORY_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND A.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo} ORDER BY A.VIEWS_CNT DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT B.SEQ, B.CONTENTS, B.IMAGE FROM T_RECIPE A JOIN T_RECIPE_DTL B ON A.RECIPE_NO = B.RECIPE_NO AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND A.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo} ORDER BY B.SEQ ASC

SELECT B.SEQ, B.NAME, B.SIZE FROM T_RECIPE A JOIN T_INGREDIENT B ON A.RECIPE_NO = B.RECIPE_NO AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND A.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo} ORDER BY B.SEQ ASC
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SEQ), 0) AS SEQ FROM T_COMMENTS WHERE RECIPE_NO = #{RECIPE_NO} AND USER_NO = #{USER_NO} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT C.USER_NAME, C.USER_IMAGE, C.USER_ID, B.CONTENTS, C.CREATE_DATETIME FROM T_RECIPE A JOIN T_COMMENTS B ON A.RECIPE_NO = B.RECIPE_NO AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' JOIN T_MEMBER C ON B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND A.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo} ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATETIME ASC
